item.title: How Agentic AI Could Finally Streamline The Overworked SOC
item.description: Agentic AI is transforming SOCs by triaging alerts, reducing analyst burnout, and enabling faster, smarter security operations at scale.

item.title: The Vivo V60 Captures Flagship Level Portraits At A Mid-Range Price
item.description: The V60 features a pair of Zeiss-branded 50-megapixel cameras that can capture portraits at various popular focal lengths.

item.title: Rokid Glasses Brings ChatGPT, Camera And Display In Discreet Form
item.description: The Rokid Glasses are the most feature-packed and sleek looking smartglasses I’ve tested yet.

item.title: Microsoft’s Free Windows Offer Deadline—Now Just 7 Weeks Away
item.description: You have 49 days to act — do not leave it too late.

item.title: Nvidia Bets Big On Optics
item.description: Nvidia’s going all-in on optical networking—1.6 Tb/s per port switches coming next year, pushing toward 12.8 Tbps. Broadcom, AMD, IBM joins.
